title: Oligarch

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose another player to make Important at night. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If an Important player doesn't visit anybody at night, they will instead automatically visit you, using their ability if possible, without being told who they visited unless their role requires it.
- Town is informed of a player becoming Important.
- You will have Basic Defense while an Important player is alive.
- You cannot make a player Important twice.

I support a form of democracy where people in power still have some power!
